name: Jelly Pop Blast
description:
WELCOME TO THE SWEETEST PUZZLE ADVENTURE 'Jelly Blast' !

Tap! Collapse! Blast!!
Enjoy the best puzzle game! Play now for free!


==Jelly Blast Features==

- Brain puzzle game with simple rules!
- There is no life limit. Play your way!
- You can play without internet connection!
- Feel free to download a low-capacity!


==How to Play==

- Easy and fun to play!
- Touch more than 2 blocks with the same color!
- Tap color bomb to Blast explode around cubes!
- Tap on 5 more blocks to generate a new blossom which has a special skill!

Are you ready? Download 'Jelly Blast' and start to enjoy the new puzzle!!!


Jelly Blast is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.
